verses.verse: For everything there is a <S%H2165>season<s%>, and a <S%H2165>time<s%> for every <S%H2656>purpose<s%> under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

a <S%H6256>time<s%> to be <S%H3205>born<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5193>plant<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to pluck <S%H6131>up<s%> that which is <S%H5193>planted<s%>;
a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7495>heal<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to break <S%H6555>down<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to build <S%H1129>up<s%>;
a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1058>weep<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7832>laugh<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7540>dance<s%>;

a <S%H6256>time<s%> to cast <S%H7993>away<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3664>gather<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H3664>together<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2263>embrace<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7368>refrain<s%> from <S%H2263>embracing<s%>;
a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6>lose<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to cast <S%H7993>away<s%>;
a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7167>rend<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8609>sew<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to keep <S%H2814>silence<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%>;
a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
What <S%H3504>profit<s%> hath he that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> in that <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H6001>laboreth<s%>?
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6045>travail<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to be exercised <S%H6031>therewith<s%>.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> everything <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> in its <S%H6256>time<s%>: also he hath <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5769>eternity<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, yet so <S%H1097>that<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> cannot find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H1097>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath done from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> even to the <S%H5490>end<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is nothing <S%H2896>better<s%> for <S%H8055>them<s%>, than to rejoice, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> so long as they <S%H2416>live<s%>.
And also that every <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in all his <S%H5999>labor<s%>, is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H430>that<s%>, whatsoever God <S%H6213>doeth<s%>, it shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: <S%H369>nothing<s%> can be <S%H3254>put<s%> to <S%H1639>it<s%>, nor anything taken from <S%H430>it<s%>; and God hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>, that men should fear before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
That which <S%H3528>is<s%> hath been long <S%H3528>ago<s%>; and that which is to be hath long ago <S%H430>been<s%>: and God <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> again that which is passed <S%H7291>away<s%>.

And moreover I <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>, that <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> was <S%H4725>there<s%>; and in the place of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, that wickedness was <S%H7562>there<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; for there is a <S%H6256>time<s%> there for every <S%H2656>purpose<s%> and for every <S%H4639>work<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, It is <S%H1700>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1305>prove<s%> <S%H7200>them<s%>, and that they may see that <S%H1992>they<s%> themselves are but as <S%H929>beasts<s%>.

For that which <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%>; even one <S%H259>thing<s%> <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> <S%H4194>them<s%>: as the one dieth, so <S%H4194>dieth<s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%>; <S%H259>yea<s%>, they have all one <S%H7307>breath<s%>; and <S%H120>man<s%> hath no <S%H4195>preeminence<s%> above the <S%H929>beasts<s%>: for all is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
All <S%H1980>go<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; all are of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and all <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

Who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1121>man<s%>, whether it <S%H5927>goeth<s%> <S%H4605>upward<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H929>beast<s%>, whether it <S%H3381>goeth<s%> <S%H4295>downward<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

Wherefore I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there is nothing <S%H2896>better<s%>, than that a <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H4639>works<s%>; for that is his <S%H2506>portion<s%>: for who shall <S%H935>bring<s%> him back to <S%H7200>see<s%> what shall be after <S%H310>him<s%>?
